text: Bahía Blanca is a city in Buenos Aires Province, Argentina. It is 4th largest city in the province, and the 16th largest in the country by metropolitan population. == History == The city was founded in 1828 with the appearance of the Argentine Protective Fortress. It has a population is about 335,190 inhabitants, according to the 2022 stadistics. == Location == It is in the coast of the Atlantic Ocean. Category:1828 establishments Category:19th- century establishments in Argentina Category:1820s establishments in South America
title: Bahía Blanca
